column4: would someone give me the command that identifies hardware, then help me read it?
it has man pages which arefar more informative
can you expand on "root folder" as well, chowning the system will make it not work
what are you intending to chown
I recently removed windows and backed up my files, I just want to put some CAD files back into the folder so I can access them from that program (running under wine)
there is no root folder involved
im not able. theyre in the root folder and it is locked
then chown your home folder back to your user, thats all
you make it sound so easy...
thanks! I think I figured it out.
